modName: Visible Windows -- BCF and BAIN Wizard
summary: This is a BAIN Conversion File packed with a Wizard script for installation using Wrye Bash (Smash). This requires Visible Windows v1.2 (either \"High\" or \"Low\" version) and Reduced Night Glow add-on by Isoku!
descriptionHtml:
This \"mod\" requires [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1840]Wrye Bash[/url], so the reader will need to [url=http://wiki.step-project.com/Guide:Wrye_Bash]acquaint him/herself with that modding utility[/url] before making use of this resource.

The [size=large][b][color=orange]BAIN Conversion File & Wizard[/color][/b][/size] are specifically targeted to the [url=http://forum.step-project.com][size=large][b]STEP Community[/b][/size][/url]; however, it is 100% applicable to all users. I augmented the BCF with several of Isoku\'s images and the wizard itself provides detail on every install option.

REMEMBER: Users will need to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6971]download Visible Windows v1.2 (either \"High\" or \"Low\" version) and Reduced Night Glow add-on by Isoku[/url] in order tu use this BCF and wizard!

To use the BCF, 
[list=1][*]Extract B_Visible Windows_(*)_BAIN-v1.2-6971-BCF.7z into the [i]Bash Installers/Bain Converters[/i] (Isoku\'s mods go into [i]Bash Installers[/i]).
[*]Launch Wrye Bash, click on the Installers tab.
[*]Select EITHER of Isoku\'s mod files, right click and choose [b][Conversions][/b] > [b][Apply][/b] > B_Visible Windows_(*)_BAIN-v1.2-6971-BCF.
[*]Right click on the newly-configured BAIN installer and select \"Wizard\" or \"Auto Wizard\" to start up the installer.
[*]Install the mod, done.
[/list]
Isoku\'s mod is highly recommended, and I am happy to facilitate installation by Wrye Bash users ... enjoy!

=================== VERSION NISTORY ===================
Version 1.0
Initial release. (Hopefully final as well!)
